entry.title: Searching for Cancer Maps in Free-Floating DNA
entry.quote: These days, scientists are especially excited by the prospect of using cell-free DNA to test for cancer. Instead of relying on invasive biopsies, they hope to find blood-borne fragments that carry distinctive cancer mutations.

entry.title: Gates, Bezos invest in cancer blood test
entry.quote: By enabling the early detection of cancer in asymptomatic individuals through a simple blood screen, we aim to massively decrease cancer mortality by detecting the disease at a curable stage.

entry.title: The Tool We Built To Help Us Work Remotely
entry.quote: Fizz keeps everything and everyone out in the open. By focusing on smaller, daily contributions towards milestones we help battle the disgruntlement, negative-spiraling and over-work that can become toxic under-currents in many remote organizations. We work in positivity through the appreciation and praise of team mates and the intrinsic reward of contributing daily to the creation of a beautiful piece of software that our users love; Fizz keeps us woven together.
